EmailTemplate.name: 202004_Global_Honeywell_Forge_Dispatch_Services_Webinar.202004_April16_Honeywell
EmailTemplate.subject: Learn About Honeywell Forge Dispatch Services and the Honeywell Forge Dashboard
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[{{my.HonLogoLink}}]]>
Webinar for Business Aviation Operators – Tune in For Details on New Promotion
Join Honeywell’s Technical Sales Manager, Carey Miller and Regional Sales Host Peter Mochnal, for a webinar that covers Honeywell Forge Dispatch Services and the new Honeywell Forge Dashboard.
In the 30-minute presentation, you will learn how Honeywell Forge Dispatch Services protects against challenges that can adversely affect the productivity and efficiency of your flight department and provides significant time and cost savings.
From start to finish, the Honeywell Forge Dispatch team monitors the aircraft position and progress of your flight while looking ahead for weather hazards, traffic congestion, ATC delays, or any other conditions that may affect your flight. We keep you informed with proactive communications sent to your mobile device, aircraft datalink or other designated destinations.
Benefits Covered in the Webinar
- Increase efficiency, save fuel and reduce delays - Preferential treatment in U.S. airspace utilizing Honeywell’s partnership with ATC - Active flight following, communication, and weather mitigation with re-route suggestions - Global coverage and support - Demo of the New Forge Dashboard!
DATE April 16, 2020
TIME 1:30 PM EST
LOCATION Online and On-Demand
HOSTED BY Carey Miller and Peter Mochnal
LIMITED TIME PROMO Tune in to get information on a new promo Honeywell is running for a limited time.
REGISTER NOW <[[https://honeywell.zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_BvzQBVARQVCjbFn2PnDRGg]]> © {{my.year}} Honeywell International Inc. This message was sent to {{lead.Email Address:default=NA}}.
